DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: UGC Configuration Content - Settings for file uploads

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Specifies the folder to which files are uploaded.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: If set, the size (in bytes) of each file that can be uploaded is limited to the set value.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A list of file extensions separated by “;”. If set, only files with listed extensions can be uploaded. Otherwise, there is no restriction on file extensions.
